strapiPost.title: Residence Community Plans For Grand Opening Next Week
strapiPost.content:
New locations for living are slowly popping up around Northwest Arkansas. 

  • Cut the ribbon: A new 55+ community located at 750 S Promenade Blvd in Rogers is having its grand opening celebration next week on April 7 and attendees can expect snacks, property tours, networking, and more. 
  • Everything you could need: The new community is called Promenade Commons and will offer 131 units with nearby access to shopping, dining, entertainment, and medical offices. The Promenade Commons amenities include but are not limited to a heated pool, a dog park, and interior courtyards with putting greens. 

Learn more about Promenade Commons HERE.
